price: Bazawubamo ubuziraherezo, ntibazoroherezwa ibihano ndetse nta n’ubwo bazahabwa agahenge.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yukhaffafu ʿanhumu al-ʿadhābu walā hum yunẓarūna
